short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YitWatch notifies you when Twitch streamer @ShaneYit goes live, changes title, or changes category.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YitWatch notifies you (via Chrome notifications) when Twitch streamer @ShaneYit goes live, changes title, or changes category so you can quickly join the stream when he's playing your favorite game or when the title catches your interest. 

Clicking on the extension icon displays the most recent clips from stream and also the most recent VODs so you're able to easily go back and catch up on missed moments from the community.
